attributes.action: Immediately issue Tulbahadur Pun (Gurkha) a UK visa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No. 10119 Rifleman Tulbahadur Pun, 6th Gurkha Rifles, Indian Army has been denied a visa to the UK on the grounds that he doesn't have ties to the UK. This is a disgrace! He is a Victoria Cross holder and not giving him a visa pours shame onto our great country. Issue him with one immediately.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
